text: The Will Eisner Comic Industry Awards, commonly shortened to the Eisner Awards, are prizes given for creative achievement in American comic books. It is often seen as the Academy Awards for comics. It is named after Will Eisner."The Will Eisner Comic Industry Awards", Comic-con.org. WebCitation archive (requires scrolldown). The Eisner Awards include the Comic Industry's Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1988 establishments in the United States Category:American awards
title: Eisner Award
